name: Melody
location: The Fort, in the brahmin pen
descriptions: Melody is a child slave at The Fort in 2281.
Melody mostly helps with taking care of the brahmin of the Fort and can usually be found at the brahmin pen. When not helping with the brahmin, she brings food and water to the legionaries.

Frumentarii: Alerio · Cato Hostilius · Gabban · Karl · Picus · Disguised frumentarius · Ulysses (formerly)
Consul: M. Licinius Crassus · M. Scribonius Libo Drusus (of the consul)

topics.response_text: {quiet, shy - nervous young girl}I can't talk to you. It's not allowed.

topics.topic_text: I'm a friend. It's okay for you to talk to friends, right?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess that's okay. Um, if you're a friend, can you help me?

topics.topic_text: {Child At Heart}Don't worry - I won't tell on you if you don't tell on me.
topics.response_text: Okay. Um... do you think you could help me?
{giggles}They do say that! I guess you can be my friend.
Um... I help take care of the Brahmin. I sometimes bring water and food to people. Um... that's it.

topics.topic_text: What did you need help with?
topics.response_text: Antony took Sergeant Teddy away and gave him to the stinky dogs. I want him back!

topics.topic_text: Uhh... wouldn't Sergeant Teddy be dead?
topics.response_text: He's a toy. I'm not a baby, you know.

topics.topic_text: They let you have toys here?
topics.response_text: I kept him secret, but I think somebody told on me.

topics.topic_text: I can't help you with that right now.
I'll see what I can do.
I got Sergeant Teddy - he's a little chewed up.
topics.response_text: That's okay, I'll fix him! Can I have him now?

topics.topic_text: Not so fast. What will you give me for him?
topics.response_text: But... I don't have anything. I thought you were my friend!

topics.topic_text: Why did Antony take him away?
topics.response_text: Antony said he was punishing me for trying to hide it from the Legion.
